results.author: Albert Einstein
results.content: Gravitation cannot be held responsible for people falling in love. How on earth can you explain in terms of chemistry and physics so important a biological phenomenon as first love? Put your hand on a stove for a minute and it seems like an hour. Sit with that special girl for an hour and it seems like a minute. That's relativity.

results.author: Aesop
results.content: It is with our passions, as it is with fire and water, they are good servants but bad masters.

results.author: The Buddha
results.content: Hatred is never appeased by hatred in this world. By non-hatred alone is hatred appeased. This is a law eternal.

results.author: The Buddha
results.content: One should train in deeds of merit—generosity, a balanced life, developing a loving mind—that yield long-lasting happiness.

results.author: The Buddha
results.content: A disciplined mind brings happiness.

results.author: The Buddha
results.content: Conquer anger with non-anger. Conquer badness with goodness. Conquer meanness with generosity. Conquer dishonesty with truth.

results.author: The Buddha
results.content: Just as a mother would protect her only child with her life, even so let one cultivate a boundless love towards all beings.

results.author: The Buddha
results.content: It is in the nature of things that joy arises in a person free from remorse.

results.author: The Buddha
results.content: Radiate boundless love towards the entire world…

results.author: The Buddha
results.content: Whatever is not yours: let go of it. Your letting go of it will be for your long-term happiness & benefit.

results.author: The Buddha
results.content: Radiate boundless love towards the entire world — above, below, and across — unhindered, without ill will, without enmity.

results.author: The Buddha
results.content: The root of suffering is attachment.

results.author: The Buddha
results.content: A noble one produces an abundance of merit by having a compassionate mind towards all living beings.

results.author: The Buddha
results.content: If with a pure mind a person speaks or acts, happiness follows them like a never-departing shadow.

results.author: The Buddha
results.content: May all beings have happy minds.

results.author: The Buddha
results.content: Both formerly and now, it is only suffering that I describe, and the cessation of suffering.

results.author: The Buddha
results.content: We will develop and cultivate the liberation of mind by lovingkindness, make it our vehicle, make it our basis, stabilize it, exercise ourselves in it, and fully perfect it.

results.author: Alan Watts
results.content: So then, the relationship of self to other is the complete realization that loving yourself is impossible without loving everything defined as other than yourself.

results.author: Abraham Lincoln
results.content: Most folks are as happy as they make up their minds to be.

results.author: Alan Watts
results.content: Never pretend to a love which you do not actually feel, for love is not ours to command.
Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
results.author: Albert Schweitzer

results.content: All love that has not friendship for its base, is like a mansion built upon the sand.
results.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

results.content: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.
results.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

results.content: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.
results.author: Dale Carnegie

results.content: Friendship often ends in love, but love in friendship - never.
results.author: Albert Camus

results.content: The person born with a talent they are meant to use will find their greatest happiness in using it.
results.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

results.content: Most people are about as happy as they make up their minds to be
results.author: Abraham Lincoln

results.content: A really great talent finds its happiness in execution.
results.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

results.content: The happiness of a man in this life does not consist in the absence but in the mastery of his passions.
results.author: Alfred Tennyson

results.content: If there is such a thing as a good marriage, it is because it resembles friendship rather than love.
results.author: Michel de Montaigne

results.content: Love is rarer than genius itself. And friendship is rarer than love.
results.author: Charles Péguy

results.content: There is only one way to happiness and that is to cease worrying about things which are beyond the power of our will.
results.author: Epictetus

results.content: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day, so I never have to live without you.
results.author: A. A. Milne

results.content: You will never be happy if you continue to search for what happiness consists of. You will never live if you are looking for the meaning of life.
results.author: Albert Camus

results.content: Love is a friendship set to music.
results.author: Joseph Campbell

results.content: Can miles truly separate you from friends... If you want to be with someone you love, aren't you already there?
results.author: Richard Bach

results.content: There is no duty we so underrate as the duty of being happy. By being happy we sow anonymous benefits upon the world.
results.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

results.content: If you love someone, set them free. If they come back, they're yours; if they don't, they never were.
results.author: Richard Bach
